ProductUsageGrant.name: ProductUsageGrant
ProductUsageGrant.description: Represents the details of a grant associated with a resource, product, or service, such as the purchased quantity, renewal and rollover policy, and validity of the grant.

DrawdownOrder.description: The order that's used to debit entitlement consumption from the usage entitlement bucket.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date and time until when the grant remains effective.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date and time when the grant becomes effective.

Label.description: The identifying label for the product usage grant.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when this record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

OverageChargeable.description: Specifies whether to charge for overages.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the product usage grant.

ProductOfferId.description: The sellable product that grants the usage resource.

ProductSellingModelId.description: The product selling model associated with the product usage grant. This field is available in API version 65.0 and later.

ProductUsageGrantNum.description: The number of each resource grant map that starts with one and is consecutive.

ProductUsageResourceId.description: The product usage resource associated with the product usage grant. Available in API version 64.0 and later.

Quantity.description: The quantity of the granted resource.

RenewalPolicyId.description: The grant renewal policy associated with the product usage grant.

RolloverPolicyId.description: The grant rollover policy associated with the product usage grant.

Status.description: The status of the product usage grant.

Type.description: The type of model that defines how the usage resource is consumed.

UnitOfMeasureClassId.description: The unit of measure class associated with the product usage grant.

UnitOfMeasureId.description: The unit for measure associated with the product usage grant. This value when specified, overrides the default unit of measure defined in the associated unit of measure class.

UsageDefinitionProductId.description: The sellable product associated with the usage resource that's used to retrieve tax policy, calculate rating during overages, and other invoicing actions.

UsageModelType.description: The ID of the unit of measure associated with the product. The type of usage model for a product or service. Anchor is the main subscription product or service. Pack is the add-on product or service that grants additional usage resources for consumption. Commit is the product or service with a specific committed quantity of consumption.

UsageResourceId.description: The usage resource associated with the product usage grant.

ValidityPeriodTerm.description: The period until when the resource grant is valid.

ValidityPeriodUnit.description: The length of a validity period for the resource grant, when used with the ValidityPeriodTerm field.
